question: Jerlin Anika, who won  gold at the 2019 World Deaf Youth Badminton Championships, is from which state?
explanation: Tamil Nadu girl Jerlin Anika has won  gold at the 2019 World Deaf Youth Badminton Championships  in Taipei, Taiwan. She has also bagged two silver and one bronze medal in the championship in the Under-18 category. She is just 15 years old and a student of class 10 in a government school in Madurai.
